General.Name: Fuse Cobalt Inc
General.Description: Fuse Battery Metals Inc., an exploration stage company, acquires, explores for, and develops energy metal projects. It explores for cobalt and lithium. The company was formerly known as Fuse Cobalt Inc. and changed its name to Fuse Battery Metals Inc. in January 2023. Fuse Battery Metals Inc. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Coquitlam, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2
